alert.note: Alert for Kauai Southwest; Waianae Coast (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 30 at 3:36PM HST until January 01 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR ALL OTHER SHORES IS CANCELLED... .The large north (010-020 deg) swell will continue to subside through tonight. A new large northwest swell (320 deg) will fill in late tonight into Sunday morning, peak Sunday afternoon, then subside into early next week. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...Surf building to 8 to 12 feet late tonight and 12 to 16 feet Sunday afternoon. * WHERE...West facing shores of Kauai and Oahu. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.
